resources.string: Permission Required
Grant the \"Write Secure Settings\" permission. You either need a PC or root to do that.
PC Instructions
Use Root
PC Instructions
Follow the instructions to grant the permission with a PC (Windows, Mac or Linux)
1 - Activate the Developer Options
Go to Android-Settings -> Phone Info -> Search for Build Number and tap multiple times until the Developer options are active.
2 - Enable USB-Debugging
Go to Android-Settings -> Developer Options -> Enable USB-Debugging
3 - Install ADB on your PC.
Gadget-Hacks - Run adb commands using Google Chrome
Lifehacker - The Easiest Way to Install Android ADB
XDA Developers - How to Install ADB on Windows, macOS and Linux
4 - Execute the ADB Command
adb shell pm grant %s android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS\n\nClick to copy.
Your device is not rooted you have to manually grant the permissions. Please follow the steps above
